home.section_1.description: We'll help you find the best financial solutions to save you money.

about.welcome.title: Welcome to
about.welcome.message: We appreciate you taking the time today to visit our web site. Our goal is to give you an interactive tour of our new and used inventory, as well as allow you to conveniently get a quote. The search for a luxury car is filled with high expectations. At Florida Car we'll help you easily find that vehicle.
about.core_values.title: Core Values
about.core_values.message: We help you choose the right vehicle by providing you with all the necessary information.
about.core_value_1: We help you get the best deal.
